data.text:
There once was a little witch 
who lived quietly, deep in the mountains.
data.processed:
<story>There once was a little witch 
<story>who lived quietly, deep in the mountains.

data.text:
But, she did not know what to use her magic for. 
"What is the purpose of my powers?" she wondered.
data.processed:
<story>But, she did not know what to use her magic for. 
<story>"What is the purpose of my powers?" she wondered.

data.text:
One night, under the dim moonlight, 
she read a picture book about the outside world.
data.processed:
<story>One night, under the dim moonlight, 
<story>she read a picture book about the outside world.

data.text:
The picture book showed people living happily 
in the outside world.
data.processed:
<story>The picture book showed people living happily 
<story>in the outside world.

data.text: "How nice. I wish I there with them."
data.processed: <story>"How nice. I wish I there with them."

data.text:
The little witch was moved and started to 
admire the outside world.
data.processed:
<story>The little witch was moved and started to 
<story>admire the outside world.

data.text:
She wondered if she could use her magic 
to make the outside world an even happier place.
data.processed:
<story>She wondered if she could use her magic 
<story>to make the outside world an even happier place.

data.text:
Before she knew it, it was already morning. 
The sunshine lit up the outside world.
data.processed:
<story>Before she knew it, it was already morning. 
<story>The sunshine lit up the outside world.

data.text:
Determined to make everyone happy, 
the little witch set foot into the outside world.
data.processed:
<story>Determined to make everyone happy, 
<story>the little witch set foot into the outside world.

data.text:
A few days have passed since Mejiro McQueen won 
the Spring Tenno Sho twice in a row――
data.processed:
<story>A few days have passed since Mejiro McQueen won 
<story>the Spring Tenno Sho twice in a row――

data.text: The training sessions of Team Sirius started to heat up.
data.processed: <story>The training sessions of Team Sirius started to heat up.

data.text: Whoo! Another new personal best!
data.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
data.processed: <story>Whoo! Another new personal best!

data.text:
Heat turns into energy, and the members 
continue to improve their times.
data.processed:
<story>Heat turns into energy, and the members 
<story>continue to improve their times.

data.text: Everyone is in high spirits.
data.processed: <story>Everyone is in high spirits.

data.text: *huff huff*
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>*huff huff*

data.text:
Doing a practice run, Mejiro McQueen once again 
shows a dignified performance.
data.processed:
<story>Doing a practice run, Mejiro McQueen once again 
<story>shows a dignified performance.

data.text:
Yep, McQueen's awesome as always! Not dropping 
her pace nor form the entire time!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>Yep, McQueen's awesome as always! Not dropping 
<story>her pace nor form the entire time!

data.text:
Surely there's no other Umamusume that 
can beat McQueen at long distances!
data.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
data.processed:
<story>Surely there's no other Umamusume that 
<story>can beat McQueen at long distances!

data.text:
It's true, there probably aren't many Umamusume 
who could compete with her at long distances.
data.processed:
<story>It's true, there probably aren't many Umamusume 
<story>who could compete with her at long distances.

data.text: But... My gaze was drawn to one other Umamusume.
data.processed: <story>But... My gaze was drawn to one other Umamusume.

data.text: But... My gaze was drawn to one other Umamusume.
data.processed: <story>But... My gaze was drawn to one other Umamusume.

data.text: *huff huff*
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>*huff huff*

data.text:
Rice Shower. Unable to achieve the results she wanted, 
she recently joined the team.
data.processed:
<story>Rice Shower. Unable to achieve the results she wanted, 
<story>she recently joined the team.

data.text:
Oof. Rice is looking pretty beat. 
She's entirely out of breath.
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>Oof. Rice is looking pretty beat. 
<story>She's entirely out of breath.

data.text:
She's not wrong. Compared to Mejiro McQueen, 
Rice Shower's running is not there yet, but...
data.processed:
<story>She's not wrong. Compared to Mejiro McQueen, 
<story>Rice Shower's running is not there yet, but...

data.text:
She's not wrong. Compared to Mejiro McQueen, 
Rice Shower's running is not there yet, but...
data.processed:
<story>She's not wrong. Compared to Mejiro McQueen, 
<story>Rice Shower's running is not there yet, but...

data.text:
She's looking at Mejiro McQueen 
with a seriously sharp gaze.
data.processed:
<story>She's looking at Mejiro McQueen 
<story>with a seriously sharp gaze.

data.text: She's holding on, no matter how tough it gets.
data.processed: <story>She's holding on, no matter how tough it gets.

data.text: And above all...
data.processed: <story>And above all...

data.text: *huff huff*
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>*huff huff*

data.text:
Almost... there...
Just a little more...
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
<story>Almost... there...
<story>Just a little more...

data.text:
You're still keeping up with me, huh? 
However...
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>You're still keeping up with me, huh? 
<story>However...

data.text: Ah!
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Ah!

data.text: *pant pant*
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>*pant pant*

data.text: *huff huff*
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>*huff huff*

data.text:
Goaaal!
Another new personal best!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>Goaaal!
<story>Another new personal best!

data.text: You're so awesome!
data.name: Droopy-eyed Horsegirl
data.processed: <story>You're so awesome!

data.text:
I wouldn't expect less from the 'Tenno Sho' Umamusume,
our ace! Right, Trainer?
data.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
data.processed:
<story>I wouldn't expect less from the 'Tenno Sho' Umamusume,
<story>our ace! Right, Trainer?

data.text: C-Could you stop the flattery, please?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>C-Could you stop the flattery, please?

data.text: And Rice, you did great too.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>And Rice, you did great too.

data.text: *huff* Eh? I did?
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>*huff* Eh? I did?

data.text: You showed some real guts, pushing your limits like that!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed: <story>You showed some real guts, pushing your limits like that!

data.text:
But... If I'm really that good at running, 
why can't I win any races...?
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
<story>But... If I'm really that good at running, 
<story>why can't I win any races...?

data.text:
I tried so hard for the Satsuki Sho, and the recent 
race too, but I only got eighth place...
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
<story>I tried so hard for the Satsuki Sho, and the recent 
<story>race too, but I only got eighth place...

data.text:
You say that, but you managed to follow behind McQueen 
all the way until the last 50 meters. Don't sweat it!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>You say that, but you managed to follow behind McQueen 
<story>all the way until the last 50 meters. Don't sweat it!

data.text: Uh... But...
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Uh... But...

data.text:
She's got to start believing in herself more. 
A positive, "I can do it!" mentality.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>She's got to start believing in herself more. 
<story>A positive, "I can do it!" mentality.

data.text:
She's got to start believing in herself more. 
A positive, "I can do it!" mentality.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>She's got to start believing in herself more. 
<story>A positive, "I can do it!" mentality.

data.text:
There's also something I noticed when we were running 
together. Something that's lacking.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>There's also something I noticed when we were running 
<story>together. Something that's lacking.

data.text: I'm talking about 'distance'.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>I'm talking about 'distance'.

data.text: D-Distance...?
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>D-Distance...?

data.text:
She's right. Your body isn't very large, but very efficient. 
And with those legs...
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>She's right. Your body isn't very large, but very efficient. 
<story>And with those legs...

data.text: You're totally suited to be a 'Stayer', Rice!
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>You're totally suited to be a 'Stayer', Rice!

data.text: You're totally suited to be a 'Stayer', Rice!
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>You're totally suited to be a 'Stayer', Rice!

data.text:
Me, a Stayer? 
McQueen is one, too...
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
<story>Me, a Stayer? 
<story>McQueen is one, too...

data.text:
Indeed. Your abilities will come to fruition 
during longer races. That race where you 
finished eighth just wasn't long enough.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Indeed. Your abilities will come to fruition 
<story>during longer races. That race where you 
<story>finished eighth just wasn't long enough.

data.text:
There's a 2400m race coming up soon. 
Although... The participants are highly skilled.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>There's a 2400m race coming up soon. 
<story>Although... The participants are highly skilled.

data.text:
There's a 2400m race coming up soon. 
Although... The participants are highly skilled.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>There's a 2400m race coming up soon. 
<story>Although... The participants are highly skilled.

data.text:
When I said that, the expression on everyone's faces 
changed, except for Rice Shower. She hasn't figured 
it out yet.
data.processed:
<story>When I said that, the expression on everyone's faces 
<story>changed, except for Rice Shower. She hasn't figured 
<story>it out yet.

data.text:
I want her to run not just any race... It's a very special 
race for Umamusume. A once-in-a-lifetime experience 
that decides who's at the very top...
data.processed:
<story>I want her to run not just any race... It's a very special 
<story>race for Umamusume. A once-in-a-lifetime experience 
<story>that decides who's at the very top...

data.text: The... The Nippon Derby?!
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>The... The Nippon Derby?!

data.text:
Rice Shower's shriek raced across the training course, 
as if it knew how fast she'd need to run in the near future.
data.processed:
<story>Rice Shower's shriek raced across the training course, 
<story>as if it knew how fast she'd need to run in the near future.
